InitialShootDM.description: Initial above ground DM weight for each species (kgDM/ha)

InitialRootDM.description: Initial below ground DM weight for each species (kgDM/ha)

InitialRootDepth.description: Initial rooting depth for each species (mm)

iniRootDepthParam.description: Initial value for the depth parameter of the root distribution function, for each species (mm)

iniRootCurveParam.description: Initial value for the exponent of the root distribution function, for each species ()

PhotosyntheticPathway.description: Metabolic pathway for C fixation during photosynthesis (C3 or C4)

isLegume.description: Whether the plant is a legume species (1=yes, 0=no)

ReferencePhotosyntheticRate.description: Reference leaf CO2 assimilation rate for photosynthesis (mgCO2/m^2 leaf/s)

LightPartitioningFactor.description: Relative factor for light partition between species (-)

FractionPAR.description: Fraction of radiation that is photosynthetic active (0-1)

CO2EffectScaleFactor.description: Scaling parameter for the CO2 effect on photosynthesis (ppm)

CO2EffectOffsetFactor.description: Scaling parameter for the CO2 effects on N requirements (ppm)

CO2EffectMinimum.description: Minimum value for the CO2 effect on N requirements (0-1)

CO2EffectExponent.description: Exponent controlling the CO2 effect on N requirements (>1.0)

GrowthTEffectExponent.description: Curve parameter for growth response to temperature ()

UseHeatStressFactor.description: Whether heat damage stress is enabled (yes/no)

HeatOnsetTemperature.description: Onset temperature for heat effects on photosynthesis (oC)

HeatFullTemperature.description: Temperature for full heat effect on photosynthesis (oC)

HeatRecoverySumDD.description: Cumulative degrees-day for recovery from heat stress (oCd)

HeatRecoveryTReference.description: Reference temperature for recovery from heat stress (oC)

UseColdStressFactor.description: Whether cold damage stress is enabled (yes/no)

ColdOnsetTemperature.description: Onset temperature for cold effects on photosynthesis (oC)

ColdFullTemperature.description: Temperature for full cold effect on photosynthesis (oC)

ColdRecoverySumDD.description: Cumulative degrees for recovery from cold stress (oCd)

ColdRecoveryTReference.description: Reference temperature for recovery from cold stress (oC)

RespirationExponent.description: Exponent controlling the effect of temperature on respiration ()

NconcOptimumForLeaves.description: Optimum N concentration of leaves (no stress) (%)

NconcMaximumForLeaves.description: Maximum N concentration of leaves (luxury uptake) (%)

NconcMinimumForLeaves.description: Minimum N concentration of leaves (dead leaves) (%)

RelativeNconcForStems.description: N concentration for stems, relative to leaves (0-1)

RelativeNconcForStolons.description: N concentration for stolons, relative to leaves (0-1)

RelativeNconcForRoots.description: N concentration for roots, relative to leaves (0-1)

RelativeNconcStage2.description: N concentration for plants at stage 2 (developing), relative to optimum (0-1)

RelativeNconcStage3.description: N concentration for plants at stage 3 (mature), relative to optimum (0-1)

InitialDMFractionsGrasses.description: Initial fractions of DM for each plant part, for non-legumes (0-1)

InitialDMFractionsLegumes.description: Initial fractions of DM for each plant part, for legume species (0-1)

EmergenceDMFractions.description: The fractions of DM for each plant part at emergence, for all plants (0-1)

DegreesDayForGermination.description: Cumulative degrees-day needed for seed germination (oCd)

TargetShootRootRatio.description: Target or ideal plant's shoot:root ratio at vegetative stage (-)

MaxRootAllocation.description: Maximum fraction of DM growth that can be allocated to roots (0-1)

ShootRootGlfFactor.description: Maximum effect that soil GLFs have on Shoot-Root ratio (0-1)

UseReproSeasonFactor.description: Whether Shoot:Root ratio should be adjusted mimicking reproductive season (perennial species) (yes/no)

ReproSeasonReferenceLatitude.description: Reference latitude determining timing for reproductive season (degrees)

ReproSeasonTimingCoeff.description: Coefficient controlling the time to start the reproductive season as function of latitude (-)

ReproSeasonDurationCoeff.description: Coefficient controlling the duration of the reproductive season as function of latitude (-)

ReproSeasonShouldersLengthFactor.description: Ratio between the length of shoulders and the period with full reproductive growth effect (-)

ReproSeasonOnsetDurationFactor.description: The proportion of the length of shoulder before the period with full reproductive growth effect (0-1)

ReproSeasonMaxAllocationIncrease.description: Maximum increase in DM allocation to shoot during reproductive growth (0-1)

ReproSeasonAllocationCoeff.description: Coefficient controlling the increase in shoot allocation during reproductive growth as function of latitude (-)

FractionLeafMaximum.description: Maximum target allocation of new growth to leaves (0-1)

FractionLeafMinimum.description: Minimum target allocation of new growth to leaves (0-1)

FractionLeafDMThreshold.description: Shoot DM at which allocation of new growth to leaves start to decrease (kgDM/ha)

FractionLeafDMFactor.description: Shoot DM when allocation to leaves is midway maximum and minimum (kgDM/ha)

FractionLeafExponent.description: Exponent of function describing DM allocation to leaves (>0.0)

FractionToStolon.description: Fraction of new growth to be allocated to stolon (0-1)

LiveLeavesPerTiller.description: Number of live leaves per tiller

SpecificLeafArea.description: Specific leaf area, per dry matter weight (m^2/kgDM)

SpecificRootLength.description: Specific root length, per dry matter weight (m/gDM)

StolonEffectOnLAI.description: Fraction of stolon tissue used when computing green LAI (0-1)

ShootMaxEffectOnLAI.description: Maximum aboveground biomass for using stems when computing LAI (kg/ha)

MaxStemEffectOnLAI.description: Maximum effect of stems when computing green LAI (0-1)

TissueTurnoverRateShoot.description: Reference daily DM turnover rate for shoot tissues (0-1)

RelativeTurnoverEmerging.description: Relative turnover rate for emerging tissues (>0.0)

DetachmentRateShoot.description: Reference daily detachment rate for dead tissues (0-1)

TissueTurnoverRateRoot.description: Reference daily DM turnover rate for root tissues (0-1)

TurnoverTemperatureExponent.description: Exponent of function for temperature effect on tissue turnover ()

TurnoverDroughtEffectMax.description: Maximum increase in tissue turnover due to water deficit (>1.0)

TurnoverDroughtThreshold.description: Minimum GLFwater without effect on tissue turnover (0-1)

DetachmentDroughtCoefficient.description: Coefficient controlling detachment rate as function of moisture ()>1.0

DetachmentDroughtEffectMin.description: Minimum effect of drought on detachment rate (0-1)

TurnoverStockFactor.description: Factor increasing tissue turnover rate due to stock trampling (0-1)

TurnoverDefoliationCoefficient.description: Coefficient of function increasing the stolons turnover rate due to defoliation (>0.0)

TurnoverMinDefoliationEffect.description: Minimum significant daily effect of defoliation on stolons turnover rate (>0.0)

FractionNLuxuryRemobStage1.description: Fraction of luxury N remobilisable from tissue 1 each day (0-1)

FractionNLuxuryRemobStage2.description: Fraction of luxury N remobilisable from tissue 2 each day (0-1)

FractionNLuxuryRemobStage3.description: Fraction of luxury N remobilisable from tissue 3 each day (0-1)

MinimumNFixation.description: Minimum fraction of N demand supplied by biologic N fixation (0-1)

MaximumNFixation.description: Maximum fraction of N demand supplied by biologic N fixation (0-1)

NFixCostMethod.description: Which method is used for determining the costs of N fixation (0-2)

SymbiontCostFactor.description: Respiration cost factor due to the presence of symbiont bacteria (kgC/kgCroots)

NFixingCostFactor.description: Respiration cost factor due to the activity of symbiont bacteria (kgC/kgNfixed)

SoilSaturationEffectMax.description: Maximum reduction in plant growth due to water logging (saturated soil) (0-1)

MinimumWaterFreePorosity.description: Minimum water-free pore space for growth with no limitations (0-1)

SoilSaturationRecoveryFactor.description: Daily recovery rate from water logging (0-1)

NDillutionCoefficient.description: Exponent for modifying the effect of N deficiency on plant growth ()

GenericGLF.description: Generic factor affecting potential plant growth (0-1)

SoilFertilityGLF.description: Generic growth limiting factor due to soil fertility (0-1)

PlantHeightMaximum.description: Maximum plant height, for each species in the sward (mm)

PlantHeightMinimum.description: Minimum plant height, for each species in the sward (mm)

PlantHeightMassForMax.description: DM weight above ground for maximum plant height (kgDM/ha)

PlantHeightExponent.description: Exponent controlling shoot height as function of DM weight (>1.0)

RootDistributionDepthParam.description: Depth from surface where root proportion starts to decrease (mm)

RootDistributionExponent.description: Exponent controlling the root distribution as function of depth (>0.0)

RootElongationRate.description: Daily root elongation rate at optimum temperature (mm/day)

DigestibilityCellWallLive.description: Digestibility of cell wall in live plant tissues (0-1) ()

DigestibilityCellWallDead.description: Digestibility of cell wall in dead plant tissues (0-1) ()

SugarFractionNewGrowth.description: Fraction of soluble carbohydrates in newly grown tissues (0-1) (0-1)

FractionStolonsStanding.description: Proportion of stolon DM standing, available for removal (0-1)

PreferenceForGreenOverDead.description: Relative preference for live over dead material during graze

PreferenceForLeafOverStems.description: Relative preference for leaf over stem-stolon material during graze

WaterUptakeSource.description: Whether water uptake is calculated by agpasture or apsim (calc/apsim)

NUptakeSource.description: Whether N uptake is calculated by agpasture or apsim (calc/apsim)

UseRootBySpecies.description: Whether root distribution is determined for each species, instead of avg sward (yes/no)

UsePhotosynthesisBySpecies.description: Whether photosynthesis is computed by species or average sward (yes/no)

UpdateLightExtCoeffDaily.description: Whether the light extinction coefficient of whole sward is computed every day (yes/no)

UseWaterAvailableBySpecies.description: Whether the water availability is determined by species, instead of whole sward (yes/no)

UseNAvailableBySpecies.description: Whether the N availability is determined by species, instead of whole sward (yes/no)

WaterAvailabilityMethod.description: The index marking the method used for determining plant available water (0-2)

NAvailabilityMethod.description: The index marking the method used for determining plant available N (0-3)

UseWaterUptakeBySpecies.description: Whether water uptake is determined by species, instead of whole sward (yes/no)

UseAlternativeNUptake.description: Whether alternative method for determining plant N uptake is to be used (yes/no)

ReferenceRLD.description: Reference root length density for water and N uptake (cm/cm3)

ReferenceKSuptake.description: Reference hydraulic conductivity for water and N uptake (mm/day)

ExponentSWCUptake.description: Exponent of water content factor for water and N uptake (-)

MaximumUptakeRateNH4.description: Maximum NH4 uptake rate for each species (ppm/day)

MaximumUptakeRateNO3.description: Maximum NO3 uptake rate for each species (ppm/day)

ll.description: Lower limit moisture for water uptake by this species (cm3/cm3)

kl.description: Coefficient for water availability for each layer (0-1)

xf.description: Exploration factor, define how hospitable the soil is for root growth (0-1)

rlvp.description: Root length density proportion, relative (to be deprecated)

kNH4.description: Coefficient for NH4 availability for each layer (0-1)

kNO3.description: Coefficient for NO3 availability for each layer (0-1)

LinearInterpolation.name: FVPDFunction
LinearInterpolation.description: Pair-wise description of the relationship between vapour deficit and relative growth
